Lees Yesterday mijn opiniebijdrage die vandaag verscheen in @lesoir en @destandaard: http://t.co/67JUYdEnCt
Find my carte blanche in @lesoir and @destandaard: 'our social struggle goes beyond the linguistic border'
'We maintain the socio-economic focus now that we are in opposition to the federal government'
'Yes, we strongly oppose measures such as index jumping or health care savings on the backs of patients'
'Yes, we say that a government that puts most of the effort on workers and families is fundamentally unfair'
'It is our duty to defend the interests of Walloons and Brussels'
'These interests are jeopardized in the current coalition, where the only French-speaking party, the MR, represents only 25% of Francophones'
'Anyone truly committed to tolerance must react when a member of the gvt shows contempt for a minority'
'This is not a community file. The interventions of PS deputies were followed by similar reactions from Flemish colleagues'
'The PS does not want a community opposition but is mobilized to defend our values ​​and those which have made the greatness of our country'
'Our proposals for more social justice do not stop at the linguistic border'
'We defend the Walloons, Brussels & Flemings who work or seek a job & who are entitled to a strong social protection'
